ch.phonon

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.Sound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Sound class has several static helper functions that allow to set the default sounds of the application. The default sounds are associated with the SoundType enum and stored internally in a EnumMap. An active SoundType can be chosen without regeneration of a new instance and either played with the run or by start when providing this Runnable to a Thread.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sound

        public Sound(SoundType type)
        This constructor allows to choose the active SoundType as first pre-defined by the static setStandardStreams(EnumMap) function. The produced Runnable can than be fed into a Thread. When starting the Thread (Thread.start()), the associated sound of the chosen SoundType is played back on the system sound output line. Alternatively, one can start the Runnable.run() method in case you would like to run the sound in active thread.
        Parameters:
        type - defines the chosen standard sound as described in SoundType
        See Also:
        Sound(AudioInputStream)

      • Sound

        public Sound(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream stream)
        This constructor allows to to choose an AudioInputStream (e.g. obtained by the as {link ResourceLoader class) source to be played back. The produced Runnable can than be fed into a Thread. When starting the Thread (Thread.start()), the associated sound of the chosen SoundType is played back on the system sound output line. Alternatively, one can start the Runnable.run() method in case you would like to run the sound in active thread.
        Parameters:
        stream - AudioInputStream to be used
        See Also:
        Sound(SoundType)

    • Method Detail

      • setStandardStreams

        public static void setStandardStreams(java.util.EnumMap<SoundType,javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream> standardInputStreams)
        Sets the standard EnumMap of AudioInputStreams that have to be present at runtime. The resources that need to be loaded into the map are explained in the SoundType class.
        Parameters:
        standardInputStreams -

      • setActiveAudioStream

        public void setActiveAudioStream(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream stream)
